DataElement.preferredName: Surgeon Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program Identifier Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program, a Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials, unique identifier for an individual surgeon.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgeon Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program, Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials, unique identifier for an individual surgeon.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A physician who treats disease, injury, and deformity by operation or manipulation.

Concepts.definition: A physician who treats disease, injury, and deformity by operation or manipulation that involves gaining access to the patient's body by incisional access.

Property.preferredDefinition: The Cancer Therapy Evaluation Program (CTEP) is the program within the Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials including extramural clinical research programs, internal resources, treatment methods and effectiveness, and compilation and exchange of data as it pertains to the development and evaluation of anticancer agents.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: The program within the Division of Cancer Treatment and Diagnosis (DCTD) of the NCI which plans, assesses, and coordinates all aspects of clinical trials including extramural clinical research programs, internal resources, treatment methods and effectiveness, and compilation and exchange of data as it pertains to the development and evaluation of anticancer agents.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
